name: The Harrowing
description:
Use f to toggle flashlight... expect a lot of bugs

PLEASE NOTE THAT THIS IS A PROTOTYPE OF 2% OF A SMALL GAME, AND THIS IS MY VERY FIRST GAME

Nextbots chase you

Spent like 10 hours on this level(newbie in all this), will take some time to do a stable release

In v.0.0, all you can do is walk around the house with the entities

Depending on the financial situation, the end product will defer but the premise is that you wake up, these next bots chase you, get into your car and go to your friend's place who is also infected too, and then go to the police(10 endings)
